thread.title: Club Loco Added to Global Connections Distribution Network For Global Discovery Vacations
thread.title_full: Club Loco Added to Global Connections Distribution Network For Global Discovery Vacations

title: Club Loco Added to Global Connections Distribution Network For Global Discovery Vacations
text: Club Loco Added to Global Connections Distribution Network For Global Discovery Vacations Global Connections expands distribution network OVERLAND PARK, KS, August 26,   Travel industry leader Global Connections, Inc. (GCI), a travel club fulfillment and service provider, announced that it continues to expand its outside sales distribution network. The newest distributor of the popular travel club product, Global Discovery Vacations, is Club Loco in North Myrtle Beach, SC. At the helm of Club Loco is Ray Lopez, with a robust resume in sales management for the vacation industry. He says "Global Discovery Vacations is a fantastic product that helps people take vacations that they maybe would not...or could not have taken otherwise. Our goal is to bring families and friends closer together by providing once-in-a-lifetime vacation experiences, year after year." According to Melanie Gring, Vice President of Strategic Alliances and Public Relations for GCI "Ray and his team are in an ideal location to tell the Global Discovery Vacations story. Myrtle Beach is positioned perfectly for this product, with an abundance of prospects looking for ways to take great vacations more economically." With four full time staff members, the distribution center is already seeing from 40 to 60 families a month and are on pace to grow at a monthly rate of 15%. "Club Loco is very appreciative of the trust and resources that Global Connections gives us with the knowledge that we will provide the very best sales experience to the new members of this elite vacation product," said Lopez. Melanie Gring adds "our business model is structured in such a way to maintain close relationships with distributors like Club Loco by offering the necessary tools and ongoing training to ensure accurate representation of our travel club and its benefits. And we are very glad to welcome Club Loco to our growing network of distributors." About Global Connections, Inc. Global Connections, Inc., headquartered in Overland Park, KS, is recognized as a leader in the travel club industry servicing and fulfilling a host of benefits and vacation options to its growing membership base. Global Connections is the owner, developer and manager of resorts in California, Florida, Colorado and Tennessee as well as owning and leasing multiple resort condominium units throughout the United States, Canada, Mexico and the Caribbean. About Global Discovery Vacations Global Discovery Vacations is a respected membership based travel club serviced and fulfilled by Global Connections, Inc. offering affordable vacations and lifestyle benefits including condominium accommodations, cruise vacations, interior design services and shopping discounts. For more information on Global Connections, Inc., visit http://www.exploregci.com For more information regarding Global Discovery Vacations, visit http://www.globaldiscoveryvacations.com Melanie Gring: 561-417-7559 Media Contact: Georgi Bohrod 619-255-1661 # # #
